tool_description: SpellRight Word Predictor transforms the way you find the perfect words for your communication needs. Powered by a comprehensive database of over 277,000 words, it’s designed to intuitively suggest the top 3 words based on the initial letters you input, enhancing your message with precision and context. Unlike traditional word predictors, SpellRight focuses on providing suggestions that closely match the length of your input, offering words that are just a few letters longer—ideal for when yo...
name: SpellRight Word Predictor
title: SpellRight Word Predictor

api_list.name: PredictWord
api_list.description: The **PredictWord** endpoint is an innovative feature of the SpellRight Word Predictor API, designed to offer intelligent word suggestions based on partial inputs. By analysing the initial letters of the word you're typing, this endpoint taps into an extensive database of over **277,000** words to suggest the most likely completions. It uniquely priorities words based on linguistic relevance and length similarity, ensuring that suggestions are not only accurate but also contextually appropriate. Ideal for enhancing writing tools, educational apps, and any application requiring advanced text input capabilities,  **PredictWord** delivers up to three top suggestions, focusing first on connectors and less common parts of speech to enrich sentence construction before offering common nouns and verbs.
